Package org.lwjgl.bullet

Class B3CameraImageData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bullet.B3CameraImageData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class B3CameraImageData
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3CameraImageData {
     int m_pixelWidth;
     int m_pixelHeight;
     unsigned char const * m_rgbColorData;
     float const * m_depthValues;
     int const * m_segmentationMaskValues;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • B3CameraImageData

        public B3CameraImageData​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a B3CameraImageData instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
